titles.title: Urging the President to designate a National Airborne Day in recognition of persons who are serving or have served in the airborne forces of the Armed Services.
Urging the President to designate a National Airborne Day in recognition of persons who are serving or have served in the airborne forces of the Armed Services.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Government Reform.

bill.summary: Urges the President to designate a National Airborne Day (honoring the airborne forces of the Armed Forces).
